forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. West southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm. Partly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. North northwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am, then a slight chance of rain between 8am and 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 60. North northeast wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers before 2am, then occasional drizzle between 2am and 5am. Cloudy, with a low around 39. North wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday

forecast.name: Saturday

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and isolated rain showers before 2am, then occasional drizzle and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a low around 38. Northwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 8am, then a chance of rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 47. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Saturday

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
